yelp_reviews.author: Magdalena M.
yelp_reviews.review: Worst property management company. We left the place we rented spotless and they withheld upwards of $500 from us. We were only in the place one year and were assigned a new property manager halfway through the year who never saw the property. I asked for an itemized list of what the costs were and they would not provide. Aside from their unprofessional manner they handled the situation, there was never a walkthrough done with us before or after we left. Would definitely not recommend as I believe we were cheated out of hundreds of dollars.

yelp_reviews.author: Josh U.
yelp_reviews.review: Overcharges people and rips off hardworking citizens. Will never have this company manage any of my properties again. Has had multiple situations arise where profits over quality appear the be the company's modus operandi.

yelp_reviews.author: Scott E.
yelp_reviews.review: Be careful if you rent a property through Optimus. They charged us $315 of our security deposit for "general cleaning" despite that we left the property spotless. The lease allowed cleaning only if we left the property dirty and we provided an extensive number of photos proving the property did not need cleaning (we spent hours scrubbing the house and leaving it clean). We asked them what needed to be cleaned by them and they were unable to answer that and said that since the cleaners were already paid there is no way to refund us. I would not rent through them again given what feels like a deceptive and dishonest business practice.

yelp_reviews.author: Mark P.
yelp_reviews.review:
House was supposedly being actively managed by Optimus (Suzzanne Medina). Took the house back after several years as a rental and found several problems that had never been mentioned.  Some examples:

1. No pets allowed: Renters obviously had a cat that severely urinated in several rooms. Had to rip out all flooring, baseboards, curtains.  The intensity (after cleaning) indicates it had been going on for a while.  
Obviously no one monitors the property well enough to know what's going on with the property.  
Cleaning had been done by Optimus but the stench was still overwhelming and NO mention was ever made of this problem.

2. Inside door to the garage had been kicked in at some point as the frame was split, door cracked around the latch, latch plate area destroyed and plate gone.  The quality of the repair was apparently someone just driving two nails into the frame to try to hold the splintered wood together.

3. Myriad of smaller poorly done repairs and ignored broken items NONE of which had ever been detailed to us.  
*Microwave door had been damaged so it wouldn't latch.  I guess you can use it by standing there and holding the door shut with your hand while it runs.  
*Toilet handle/lever was wrong.  Its on an angled part of the tank and the wrong handle with a straight arm was used so the arm scrapped the inside of the tank.  It bound up when flushed so the handle never pops back.  After the renters moved out the toilet had been running for a solid month in the midst of local water restrictions.
*Outside outlet box had come loose due to damaged wooden plate and was hanging out of the wall.
*Furnace had not been inspected in over 4 years per maintenance label.
*Mold (light but still mold) growing in the master bath shower upper wall/ceiling.
*Bottom of a kitchen cabinet drawer was separated from the back and was coming apart.

You get the picture.  Choose wisely if you actually want a management company that actively looks out for the property.

yelp_reviews.author: Mary H.
yelp_reviews.review:
As a tenant I recently vacated a residence being managed by this company. I must advised they are poor communicators, with no response or calls returned. I dealt with Julia who failed to communicate that my security deposit had been returned to me on a specific date. What I received was "your security deposit was returned a copy of days ago." however they never asked for an address to send the deposit. In addition, when asked where it was sent, the response was "the last known address". Again, what did they consider the last known address?? I called to inquire when email was not returned but was unable to speak with Julia, she was supposedly in a meeting with the owners??  I left a voicemail. Shortly after received an email that indicated that it had been sent to the address which I had just vacated.  Does that really make sense, or is this just a ploy to delay.  Would have been more professional to advise me of the date the deposit was sent,  as well as the address it was sent to. Unfortunately it was similar to what is referred to as pulling teeth to get a simply answer. 
I hope that you do not have to experience but I am guessing you will.

summary.text:
Good

User reviews highlight several positive aspects of Optimus Property Solutions. Customers have voiced their appreciation for staff members who are friendly and helpful, demonstrating a professional attitude while also handling inquiries promptly. Specifically, multiple users have praised Julia and Lisa for their responsiveness and thoroughness, which has made dealings with the company smooth and commendable experiences. Additionally, the company has garnered praise for handling complex maintenance and repair issues efficiently. Successful management of tasks such as roofing, gutter cleaning, and resolving drainage issues, as well as improvements in various rental units, has been highlighted in some reviews. Clients acknowledge their satisfaction with the enhancements brought to properties under Optimus Property Solutions' management.

Great

Optimus Property Solutions has received glowing recommendations from some reviewers for their comprehensive property management services. Tenants have celebrated the company for its dedication to maintaining and upgrading properties, exemplified by major updates like parking lot resealing and interior renovations, including new carpets and paint jobs. These updates have been completed efficiently, prompting several customers to commend the company's capacity to maintain low vacancy rates and its proactive approach in catching up on years of deferred maintenance. Reviewers with a long-term relationship with the company appreciated Julia's managerial acumen and communication prowess, noting the excellent turnaround on maintenance requests. The commitment in these cases has led clients to highly recommend Optimus to others seeking property management expertise.

Bad

There have been various critical user reviews citing significant issues with Optimus Property Solutions. One recurring theme is poor communication, with tenants often indicating that their inquiries or maintenance requests remained unanswered or were met with considerable delays. In particular, several reviewers found it challenging to have maintenance issues resolved timely, which made their living situations uncomfortable. Another prominent concern expressed is the deduction of security deposits for unwarranted reasons. Multiple accounts describe instances where tenants are charged for cleaning or repairs supposedly covered or which were unfounded, despite photographic evidence provided by tenants contradicting these claims.

Ugly

More severe criticisms have been directed at Optimus Property Solutions regarding unethical practices and unprofessional behavior. One alarming narrative reported involves tenants feeling cheated due to large sums being withheld from security deposits without proper justification or walkthroughs before and after occupancy, raising suspicions of deceptive practices. Other negative experiences include property negligence, where tenants unearthed significant wear and tear or damages not disclosed by property managers, such as unreported pet damage or poorly executed repairs. Additionally, there are disturbing accounts where communication from property managers was not only lacking but also unprofessional and combative when approached about issues, creating a fraught living experience for tenants who expected reasonable support from their management company.
